snippet: Armin Zöggeler of Italy was the first athlete to win a medal in the same individual event at six consecutive Olympics.
abstract: Italian luge star Armin Zoggeler, first athlete to win a medal in the same individual event at six consecutive Olympics, announces his retirement.
lead_paragraph: Armin Zöggeler of Italy was the first athlete to win a medal in the same individual event at six consecutive Olympics.
